parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: DatabaseType
parameters.description:
The type of the database. Valid values:

*   **MYSQL**
*   **MSSQL**
*   **Oracle**

parameters.name: InstanceName
parameters.description: The name of the Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: 20. If you leave this parameter empty, 20 entries are returned on each page.

>  We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: QueryType
parameters.description:
The condition that is used to query the database. Valid values:

*   **create**: newly created
*   **restore**: restored

parameters.name: UniRegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the server that hosts the database.
